definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: My family's sorrow is to be expressed in personal tributes to the matriarch of our family.
sentences.chinese: 我們的悲傷將以個人對家裏的女家長的悼念來表達。

sentences.english: After thinking for few days, I finally remembered that I've forgotten my banquet (bride's side).
sentences.chinese: 想了好幾天，才知道我忘了女家的酒席。

sentences.english: The matriarch of the Gandhi dynasty is keeping her grip on power.
sentences.chinese: 甘地王朝的女家長正牢牢的把握着權力。

definition: to send the betrothal gifts/(fig.) to conclude a marriage
first return of bride to her parental home
variant of 定親|定亲[ding4 qin1]
dowry/to give as a dowry/to accompany sb
variant of 訂婚|订婚[ding4 hun1]
to pay bride-price (payment to the bride's family in former times)
(of the groom's family) to send a bridal sedan chair 花轎|花轿 to fetch the bride/to send a party to escort the bride to the groom's house
